metadata.Title: CVE-2021-1844 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 14.4.1 and iPadOS 14.4.1, Safari 14.0.3 (v.14610.4.3.1.7 and 15610.4.3.1.7), watchOS 7.3.2, macOS Big Sur 11.2.3.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-1844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-5.0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-webkit2-5.0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libjavascriptcoregtk-5.0-0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libwebkit2gtk-5.0-0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.0-1ubuntu3').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
